name: Simone Martin
text: As an experienced knowledge engineer with two years of experience, I can bring my expertise to your organization in the fields of robotic process automation, Natural Language Understanding, and new technologies in general.
In my latest experience I have been working at Expert.AI in the Financed Projects division where I have developed my skills in Python and Javascript.

I am committed to delivering high-quality work and have a reputation for completing projects on time. My previous experience includes teaching English in a bilingual kindergarten and working with English summer schools in Bournemouth and Brighton, where I served as an Activity Leader, Academic Intern, and Student Services member.

In addition, I have written a dissertation on the benefits of a SEO-based approach to website localization, which provided a concrete example of a localized website. I continue to learn new skills, especially in the field of coding, and enjoy automating with Python. This website is the output of me learning how ReactJS works.
I am confident that I can add value to your organization by contributing to challenging projects and providing reliable support to my team.
